name: ASWebAuthenticationSession
desc: A session that an app uses to authenticate a user through a web service.

items.name: init(url: URL, callbackURLScheme: String?, completionHandler: ASWebAuthenticationSession.CompletionHandler)
items.desc: Creates a web authentication session instance.

items.name: typealias ASWebAuthenticationSession.CompletionHandler
items.desc: A completion handler for the web authentication session.

items.name: var prefersEphemeralWebBrowserSession: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the session should ask the browser for a private authentication session.

items.name: var canStart: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the session can begin.

items.name: var presentationContextProvider: ASWebAuthenticationPresentationContextProviding?
items.desc: A delegate that provides a display context in which the system can present an authentication session to the user.

items.name: protocol ASWebAuthenticationPresentationContextProviding
items.desc: An interface the session uses to ask a delegate for a presentation context.

items.name: struct ASWebAuthenticationSessionError
items.desc: Errors that a web authentication session can generate.
